name: Legends Evolve
description:
Legends Evolve is a top down shmup made for OMGJam5 (One Mechanic Game Jam)

https://www.lamestargames.com/gamejams/

Arrow keys or wasd to move

Spacebar or mouse click to shoot

Features

  • Randomly generated levels
  • Original soundtrack
  • Online leaderboard
  • Retro inspired graphics

Made with Unity3D

Music and SFX made in Ableton Live

I made the art and soundtrack as well as did the coding for the game. Made the game solo.

Please rate the game, and leave me a comment if there is anything that is missing. Maybe I'll be able to put it in!
